dmca.title: Re:  Warren Alloy
dmca.body:
Dear Mr. Swartzendruber:

Be advised that I am the attorney for Warren Alloy.  It has come to my attention that you have taken unauthorized pictures of the Warren Alloy facility and placed them on the internet.  Unauthorized use of the image of Warren Alloy is prohibited and demand is made that you immediately remove the photographs and the reference to Warren Alloy from your site and from the internet.

Your failure to do so within 30 days from the date of this letter will result in action by Warren Alloy to remedy the situation and damages caused by you and your actions.

Truly Yours,

Sidney J. Suo

SJS/kb

cc: Warren Alloy
